The Overbite Project

Posted to Mottr.am by
Jack
on 07 November 2009. Tags: gopher

The Overbite Project make a Firefox add-on that adds Gopher support to current browsers. Strange but true: there are more Gopher servers online today than there were in 2007! Update 11/11/09: An Ars Technica piece on Gopher includes links to a Gopherchan, and a Gopher Twitter stream.
